settings.content: Our Citrus Stem C Serum contains plant-based stem cells, Caribbean Orange Oil and Vitamin C for extra brightening power. Used twice per day in the morning and night, this serum not only targets dark spots and discoloration, but also improves skin’s elasticity and firmness.

The next step in a radiant, even skin tone is our Luxury Concealer. Our full-coverage formula covers and corrects all age-related imperfections including dark circles and undereye bags; dark spots, hyperpigmentation and redness; and dull, dry skin. Specifically formulated for ages 40 and up, Fièra Luxury Concealer never settles or cakes into fine lines or wrinkles. After applying Apple Stem Cell Cream in the morning, apply just a small amount of the Concealer and use the Fièra Concealer Brush to blend it into the skin. For an all-over even tone, apply as you would a foundation - or use it as a true concealer, applying it just where you need it.
Used consistently, this powerful duo will not only improve skin tone by fading dark spots and hyperpigmentation, but also to completely conceal any lasting discoloration while firming the skin.

settings.title: Sodium Hyaluronate
settings.content: The sodium salt of hyaluronic acid, able to hold more water than any other natural substance—up to 1000 times its weight in water for maximum skin hydration that tightens and improves the skin’s overall appearance.

settings.title: Hydrolyzed Collagen
settings.content: Collagen makes up 75% of your skin, making this high-quality version a no-brainer to enhance the appearance of dry and damaged skin and achieve a dewy, fresh and younger-looking skin.

settings.title: Citrus Stem Cells
settings.content: Scientifically-proven plant-based stem cells that delay the signs of skin aging and enhance the appearance of skin elasticity, giving your skin that firmer, tighter and smoother look and feel.

settings.title: Vitamin C
settings.content: The skin tissues LOVE Vitamin C due to its powerful antioxidant properties, helping to protect against free radicals and reducing the appearance of age spots, blemishes and redness.

settings.title: Caribbean Orange Oil
settings.content: A powerful antioxidant skin protector that diminishes uneven skin tone and fights off the signs of aging.

settings.title: Squalane
settings.content: For skin collagen, moisturizes and protects the skin from oxidative damage, resulting in tighter, more hydrated skin softness.

settings.title: Active Ingredients
settings.sub_title: Products in the Fièra Firm & Fade Set contain the highest-quality, proven ingredients. Together, they work as a comprehensive all-in-one solution for dry, dull skin; dark spots and hyperpigmentation; sagging, fine lines and wrinkles.
settings.popup_content:
Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Ozokerite, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Steareth-20, Chrysin, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, [+/- (May Contain): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Ultramarines (CI 77007)].

Fièra Stem C Serum

Water, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Saccharide Isomerate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Callus Culture Extract, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Carrageenan, Sclerotium Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Polyacrylate, Iron Oxide (CI77492), Iron Oxide (CI77491).

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund.
